import SpaceRoute from './SpaceRoute'
import AnswerRoute from './AnswerRoute'
import GetImageRoute from './GetImageRoute'


export default{
    SpaceRoute,
    AnswerRoute,
    GetImageRoute
}

import SpaceRoute from './SpaceRoute'
import AnswerRoute from './AnswerRoute'
import GetImageRoute from './GetImageRoute'
import UserRoute from './UserRoute'

export default{
    SpaceRoute,
    AnswerRoute,
    GetImageRoute,
    UserRoute
}
